VOTE_DESCRIPTION: Use this command to Vote for Sofi on Top.GG. Every Vote you contribute to Sofi will reward you with 1 Wist on a weekday and 2 Wists on a weekend.
USE_WIST: You will obtain 1 **Wist** <:wist:870339503427027005> for each successful **Vote** on [Top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/853629533855809596)!
USE_ELIXIR: You will obtain 5 **Elixirs** <:xelixir:979673719884636210> for each successful **Vote** on [DiscordBotList](https://discordbotlist.com/bots/sofi/upvote)!
EMBED_FOOTER: You get double the amount of Wists on a weekend
